channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge., 5th July
item.description:
The pavement is overgrown, and when vehicles are parked it is impossible to use the path! and as you see from the picture provided I use a mobility scooter as I am disabled, Can you please drastically thin out the bush's please and retarmac the pothole next to the path where there used to be a road sign!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hathaway Place, Little Thurrock, Grays
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous fly tipping on street outside school, 5th July
item.description:
There's an increasing problem on Wyndcliff Road of people fly tipping mainly household rubbish. The bin (close proximity to the school) is continuously consumed by people filling with what looks to be household rubbish. Recently, cars have been turning up to dispose of large quantities of waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wyndcliff Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car appears to be abandoned, 5th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Longlands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown grass, 5th July
item.description:
The grass outside our front door which belongs to the maisonette downstairs has been left to overgrow. It’s causing an eye sore and attracting bugs and we have a newborn baby and we don’t like to leave our windows open in the heat we’ve been having.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gresham Close, Blendon, London
